short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change background color of paragragh using this chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension will highlight each paragraph used on web page. Paragraphs will be highlighted in different color. Clicking again will remove the highlighted color.
